Finally, we compared the as-prepared BGT:0.6%Mn
type red-emitting phosphors. Their host materials, optimal
doping concentrations, PL and PLE peaks, and IQEs are
. It can be seen that BGT:0.6%Mn
phosphors had a higher IQE and better PL properties than
other phosphors. These results further demonstrated that the
optical properties could be applied in plant growth LEDs.
